caseTitle: The Competition Commission of Pakistan,Islamabad and others v. Dalda Foods Limited Karachi
authorJudge: (1) Mrs. Justice Ayesha A. Malik (2) Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline:
Scope of the Powers of the Competition Commission under Sections 33, 36 and 37 of the Competition Act, 2010.

Tagline (2): The additional note underscores the difference between the object and scope of “proceedings,” “studies” and “enquiries” conducted by the Commission under Chapter IV of the Competition Commission Act, 2010 and the duty of the Commission to act justly, fairly and reasonably while exercising its discretionary power under Section 37(1) to initiate on its own an enquiry against an undertaking.
